Attacks.Name: Scratch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Sandshrew gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Sand Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Blind special condition, reducing their attack dice by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Defense Curl
Superpowers.Effect: Sandshrew gains 1 additional die in defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Dig
Superpowers.Effect: Place Sandshrew within Range 2. After placement, enemy characters within Range 1 of Sandshrew suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Rollout
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Sandshrew may advance S.

Superpowers.Name: Sandstorm
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Sandshrew suffer -1 defense die until the end of the round.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Sandslash character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
